channel.title: Help please
channel.description: well, i am having trouble making the kalphite queen drop any items, i have got her to spawn and i can kill her, but she wont drop anything, and i have looked at the item2 file and the npcdrops file and it supposedly says that she drops something, i am looking for some help on this, and if you can tell me how to make her drop 1 item at a time, i would be grateful

item.title: Help please
